dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey B, have you, uh, heard much about Virgin Voyages? Richard Branson's new cruise line?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey B, have you, uh, heard much about Virgin Voyages? Richard Branson's new cruise line?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally, A! The Scarlet Lady, right? It's like, supposed to be a total game-changer for cruising.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally, A! The Scarlet Lady, right? It's like, supposed to be a total game-changer for cruising.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently being built at the Fincantieri shipyard in Genoa, Italy, the adults-only, 2,700-passenger Scarlet Lady is expected to heighten the buzz about what a cruise can be.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! They're building it now in Italy, and the whole vibe, um, is really aimed at people who wouldn't normally consider themselves, like, traditional cruisers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! They're building it now in Italy, and the whole vibe, um, is really aimed at people who wouldn't normally consider themselves, like, traditional cruisers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently being built at the Fincantieri shipyard in Genoa, Italy... Branson's brainstorm-at-sea has steered its plans toward a fun, youthful, active vibe with barrier-breaking edginess: sea travel for those who would not readily consider themselves traditional cruisers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, it's all about that, uh, "fun, youthful, active" vibe. And Branson himself calls it for the "young at heart."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, it's all about that, uh, fun, youthful, active vibe. And Branson himself calls it for the young at heart.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Branson's brainstorm-at-sea has steered its plans toward a fun, youthful, active vibe with barrier-breaking edginess... Says energetic billionaire Branson: Its for the young at heart.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And get this â€“ the name, Scarlet Lady, is actually a nod to Virgin Atlantic's early planes. But it's also about female empowerment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And get this - the name, Scarlet Lady, is actually a nod to Virgin Atlantic's early planes. But it's also about female empowerment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a nod to its sister company Virgin Atlantic, Virgin Voyages' execs looked to the airline's early fleet of planes for ship-naming inspiration. Scarlet Lady won the title and its moniker is purposefully inspirational. The ship will feature an iconic mermaid image described as a strong spirit guide.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I heard about that! They're planning this "Scarlet Squad" program to support women in, like, marine and technical roles, which is, um, traditionally been a male-dominated field.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I heard about that! They're planning this Scarlet Squad program to support women in, like, marine and technical roles, which is, um, traditionally been a male-dominated field.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Plans are afloat to promote a Scarlet Squad employee-development program, which will support, mentor and train women in key positions within the company, especially in jobs involving marine, hotel and technical management departments that have largely been men's cruise industry domain.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! Virgin Voyages CEO Tom McAlpin said they want to create an onboard environment where everyone can reach their full potential. It's really cool.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! Virgin Voyages C E O Tom McAlpin said they want to create an onboard environment where everyone can reach their full potential. It's really cool.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Virgin Voyages President and CEO Tom McAlpin explains: Across the maritime industry, we can do better in onboard recruiting and leadership representation for women. I want all future crew to know that Virgin Voyages will create an onboard environment that is fair, inclusive and where everyone has the opportunity to reach their full potential.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's awesome. [interrupts] And speaking of potential, their focus on health and well-being sounds incredible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's awesome. And speaking of potential, their focus on health and well-being sounds incredible.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Health and well-being are top onboard goals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah! "Vitamin Sea" and "ship-shape moves." They've got, like, a B-Complex with build, burn, bike, and balance areas, plus sunrise yoga.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah! Vitamin Sea and ship-shape moves. They've got, like, a B-Complex with build, burn, bike, and balance areas, plus sunrise yoga.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The B-Complex will harbor Build, Burn, Bike and Balance areas with state-of-the-art exercise and gymnastics equipment overlooking the seascape. Complimentary group fitness classes will be aplenty, as well as sunrise and sunset yoga.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And the spa! Redemption, it's called, with a hydrotherapy pool, mud room, salt room, even DJ-fueled spa parties.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the spa! Redemption, it's called, with a hydrotherapy pool, mud room, salt room, even D J-fueled spa parties.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Another interesting moniker has been fastened to the spa, called Redemption, which will indulge with a menu of massages plus a hydrotherapy pool, mud room, cold plunge pools, on-trend salt room and quartz beds. Expect evening spa parties to be enlivened with DJ music and delectable libations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Don't forget the Stubble & Groom barbershop for men and unisex manicures. I mean, they're really covering all bases.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Don't forget the Stubble and Groom barbershop for men and unisex manicures. I mean, they're really covering all bases.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pampering packages for men are formulated at the Stubble & Groom barbershop, as well as unisex manicures and pedicures at the Dry Dock salon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: My favorite part, though, has to be their environmental consciousness. No single-use plastics for passengers at all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: My favorite part, though, has to be their environmental consciousness. No single-use plastics for passengers at all.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Virgin Voyages, single-use plastics for passengers will be banned: beverage bottles, coffee cups, condiment packets, food packaging, shopping bags, stirrers and straws.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's a huge step. They're using green alternatives, recycling wastewater... Branson himself said business can be a force for good.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's a huge step. They're using green alternatives, recycling wastewater... Branson himself said business can be a force for good.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Green alternatives will be implemented recyclable and reusable. Complimentary filtered still and sparkling water will be available at all bars and restaurants. Wastewater will be recycled and turned into energy whenever possible. Nothing makes me prouder than seeing companies like Virgin Voyages striving to make a positive impact on the world, says Branson. Business is a force for good and can and must be the catalyst for global change.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which is, like, super important, especially for an ocean-based business. They want to make an "Epic Sea Change for All."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is, like, super important, especially for an ocean-based business. They want to make an Epic Sea Change for All.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Adds McAlpin, We believe that in order to fulfill our purpose of creating an Epic Sea Change for All, we must make a commitment that is bigger than just eliminating straws.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. And just to wrap up, it's adults-only, 18 and over, sailing seven-day Caribbean itineraries from Miami.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. And just to wrap up, it's adults-only, eighteen and over, sailing seven-day Caribbean itineraries from Miami.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The first of three planned Virgin Voyages ships, Scarlet Lady (strictly for those 18 years and older) will sail seven-day Caribbean itineraries from the port of Miami.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, definitely not your grandma's cruise, huh? Sounds pretty exciting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, definitely not your grandma's cruise, huh? Sounds pretty exciting.
